p: Territory of Washington County of Spokane}ss: Mr. J.E. Johnston Hnrey Spougle and John Blakely being duly sworn, such for himself deposes and says: That he resides in Spougle precinct in said county and Territory: Then he has heard & read the foregoing affidavit of W.A. Soudads, that the facts therein stated are true as he verily believes. That he believes an unprejudiced jury could be secured in said precinct to try said case that said W.A. Soudads is well known to applicant and thatheis worthy of belief. G.E. Jennings Henry Sprange John Blakely Subscribed and sworn to before me this 10th day of December A.D. 1886. S.C. Hyde Notary public for Washington Territory.
